import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, FormGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Helmet from '../components/Helmet/Helmet'; import CommonSection from '../components/UI/CommonSection'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../styles/contact.css'; const socialLinks = [ { url: 'https://web.facebook.com/advancecarrentbd', icon: 'ri-facebook-line', }, { url: 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/advance-car-rent-bd', icon: 'ri-linkedin-line', }, ]; const Contact = () => { return (

Contact Information

{socialLinks.map((item, index) => ( ))}
); }; export default Contact;
